body:
Avicus 1.0

NuclearDucky is lvl 44 99/100!!

Avicus 2.0

NuclearDucky is now lvl 43 0/100!!

I judt found out this happened. Considering   non donor and it took me 2 years to get to lvl 45 (im bad) im pretty fricking d. Im wondering if this happened to anyone else?

title: Am I The Only One?

replies.body: Yeah, i was 50 but after Avicore i was 49 1/4 :/
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, i was 50 but after Avicore i was 49 1/4 :/

replies.body:
Also, i just reached lvl 45 today :/ i wouldve been 47.

Staff plz help me :'(
replies.body_tagged:
Also, i just reached lvl 45 today :/ i wouldve been 47.

Staff plz help me :'(

replies.body:
I'm 5th so I wouldn't really know, but as I was once a non donator,I can understand how much this must stink. 

If this happend to a lot of people I'm sure a higher up staff member could do something to help :P
replies.body_tagged:
I'm 5th so I wouldn't really know, but as I was once a non donator,I can understand how much this must stink. 

If this happend to a lot of people I'm sure a higher up staff member could do something to help :P

replies.body: The staff probs dont believe us though. I mean, it may look like were trying to trick them to give us lvls :/
replies.body_tagged: The staff probs dont believe us though. I mean, it may look like were trying to trick them to give us lvls :/

replies.body: Luckily I was only set back one level, but yeah it kinda sucked :P
replies.body_tagged: Luckily I was only set back one level, but yeah it kinda sucked :P

replies.body: Although I don't doubt you, it looks to me as if not everyone lost the same amount of XP.  This would make it extremely difficult to put everyone where they were, and even then it would seem like forum favoritism.  Not everyone who lost a level or two goes on the forums, I'm sure.
